tool_description: The Uncovered Treasure API has more than 25,000 revealed truths from every Book and chapter in the Bible as recorded by Phil Largent over the last 25 years.
name: Uncovered Treasure
title: Uncovered Treasure

api_list.name: /topics
/random
/verse/{verse}

required_parameters.name: verse
required_parameters.description: Use common English name with chapter number and optionally verse, such as "1 Corinthians 1", "1 Corinthians 1:5" or "James 3". Does NOT support ranged searches, such as "James 3:1-4".

api_list.name: /search/{searchterm}
api_list.description: Search for treasure by term, e.g. "wisdom"

api_list.name: /today
/topic/{topic}
api_list.description: Get entries from a specific topic
